name: Spellbound Clicker
description:
This is the first alpha / prototype of a rythm based clicker

Follow Sirenna, the sin of greed, as she uses her singing powers for good!

You can pick any stage up until 100, pick the ones that aren't to easy or to difficult.

If you want to continue to the next area at 101, you need to buy atleast 50 decor first.
